title: Outsiders edge past Spirit in CIS matchup, fnatic defeat ENCE in Rio
description: Outsiders emerged victorious at the end of a thrilling bout on Dust2 which went the full 30 rounds.

title: MOUZ and Liquid go 2-1 with close victories; NAVI and Vitality on brink of elimination
description: The 1-1 games have got underway with two highly competitive games, as both went at least 30 rounds.

title: Photos: Legends arrive at the Major
description: Take a peek at some of the moments captured on film from the first day of the IEM Rio Major Legends Stage.

title: SunPayus: "I'm adapting well on T-side, I can focus more on my individual play"
description: The Spaniard, known for his strong CT sides with Movistar Riders, says he has been hard at work to become more impactful on the attack with ENCE.

title: Round 3 matchups set for IEM Rio Legends Stage
description: Heroic and Cloud9 will face off in a best-of-three for the first spot in the playoffs.

title: Heroic demolish fnatic; Outsiders put NIP on brink of elimination
description: Casper "cadiaN" MÃ¸ller's team steamrolled past the European combine on Mirage to go 2-0.

title: Sadokist removed from Major broadcast
description: ESL has confirmed that Anders "Anders" Blume will step in for Matthew "Sadokist" Trivett on the commentators' post for the remainder of the Major.

title: FURIA recover from nine-round deficit to beat Spirit; ENCE ease past Bad News Eagles
description: The Brazilian team are now just one win away from qualifying for the playoffs on home soil.

title: NAF: "I hope there's always a slot in the calendar year for an event in Brazil"
description: Liquid felt the warmth of the fans in their first matches in Rio and Keith "NAF" Markovic had nothing but compliments for the Brazilian crowd.

title: Vitality send FaZe to elimination pool; Cloud9 come back versus NAVI
description: Dan "apEX" Madesclaire's side crushed the reigning Major champions in a one-sided match.
